short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies selected text and formats it to a valid Git branch name for feature or bugfix branches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In Azure DevOps you must manually write your branch name when creating a new branch. With this extension you can select a text containing both the ID and Title, and right click to use the Branch Namer menu items "Copy to feature branch" or "Copy to bugfix branch". The text can then be pasted into Name field.
